resources.string: Titiksha is the annual science and technology festival of SMVDU. Titiksha is the largest festival of Jammu Kashmir. Titiksha has a footfall of more than 5000 students. Titiksha showcases various Innovative Projects,Tech Talks,Entrepreneurial Talks,Technical Events,Mega Events,Gaming Zones,Concerts by Various Artists and many more...

only for 1 st year and 2 nd year students
Totally based on electronics.
ROUND-1:
1] We will present 4 circuits at a time with their proper name witten below it for 30
sec{time may exceed to 40 sec}
2]We will give name of components to the participants and ask the circuit in which it was
present{they can either write the name or number of the circuit}.
3]We will finalise top 5 participants on the basis of their right answer.
NOTE- A PEN AND A BLANK PAPER WILL BE PROVIDED TO THE
PARTICIPANTS FOR DRAWING THE CIRCUIT(IF THEY WANT) WITHIN TIME
LIMIT AND ALSO FOR WRITING THE ANSWER.
ROUND-2
1] 5 basic questions will be asked from the selected participants from round 1.Questions
will be based on basic electronics.
2]1 st,2 nd ,3 rd rankers will be decided on the answers.
